content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### New Stone Furnace at position (2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 2))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The furnace cannot accept items if it is full.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that there are enough items in the furnace to extract. Attempting to extract when the furnace has no items will result in an error.

### Errors related to crafting
- Ensure that you have the required ingredients available in your inventory before attempting to craft items. If a required ingredient is missing, the crafting will fail.

### Errors related to missing entities
- Ensure that all necessary entities, such as steam engines for power supply, are placed on the map before attempting to use them. If an entity is not found at the specified position, it cannot be used.
